jokes.content: Marame illadha Kaadu Enna kaadunu theriyuma
Marame illadha Kaadu Enna kaadunu theriyuma

jokes.dialogue: Enna dhan unga oorla Vellam Vandhalum , andha Vellathaula sakkara pongal panna mudiyuma ?

jokes.question: Ulagathulaye Kan operation enga nadandhadhu
jokes.answer: Romba Easy Sir , Kan la dhan nadandhadhu

jokes.dialogue: Aiyya , Jetti pottu Mutti podalam, Aana Mutti pottu Jetti poda mudiyuma ?

jokes.line1: Oruthan enna pannan , idhe maari oru periya veedu , andha veetukku pachcha colour satta pottukuttu , vella colour vetti kattikittu , Straight ah veetukku poi , Kadha thattu thattu thattu nu thattitan
jokes.line3: Yena andha veetla calling bell illa

jokes.content: Rendu Puli , veriyana pasi , kaatu kulla pochan , maan onnu kedachadhu , Oru puli mattum saaptichan , oru puli sapuda ve illaya , Yen ?
jokes.subcontent: Yaena andha puli sabarimalai ku maala pottuchan

jokes.content: Make up pottutrindhan ayya , appo eyeliner kum lipstick kum sanda vandhichan , yaaru periyavanga nu , aana lipstick jeichirichan , Yen ?

jokes.dialogue: Unga Oorla pongal ku leave viduvanga , idly ku leave viduvangala ?

jokes.line1: Tiger : Anna , Room ku pudusa anna ?
jokes.line3: Tiger : Anna oru Paththu Ruva panam Kadan kudunga na
jokes.line4: Vadivel Balaji : Yenga , enna nga baathroom pora edathula vandhu kadan kekuringa

jokes.content: Oru police enna pannaru , Oru thirudana odi odi odi pudichi, Straight ah jail ku kootunu vandharu ,Jail ku ulla thallra munnadi , thirudan thalaila fulla enna thecharu , Yen ?
